For<S>1063</S> this<S>3778</S> Melchisedec<S>3198</S>, king<S>935</S> of Salem<S>4532</S>, priest<S>2409</S> of the most high<S>5310</S> God<S>2316</S>, who<S>3588</S> met<S>4876</S> Abraham<S>11</S> returning<S>5290</S> from<S>575</S> the slaughter<S>2871</S> of the kings<S>935</S>, and<S>2532</S> blessed<S>2127</S> him<S>846</S>;
To whom<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> Abraham<S>11</S> gave<S>3307</S> a tenth part<S>1181</S> of<S>575</S> all<S>3956</S>; first<S>4412</S> <S>3303</S> being by interpretation<S>2059</S> King<S>935</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S>, and<S>1161</S> after that<S>1899</S> also<S>2532</S> King<S>935</S> of Salem<S>4532</S>, which is<S>3603</S>, King<S>935</S> of peace<S>1515</S>;
Without father<S>540</S>, without mother<S>282</S>, without descent<S>35</S>, having<S>2192</S> neither<S>3383</S> beginning<S>746</S> of days<S>2250</S>, nor<S>3383</S> end<S>5056</S> of life<S>2222</S>; but<S>1161</S> made like<S>871</S> unto the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>; abideth<S>3306</S> a priest<S>2409</S> continually<S>1519</S> <S>1336</S>. <sup>without descent: Gr. without pedigree</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> consider<S>2334</S> how great<S>4080</S> this man<S>3778</S> was, unto whom<S>3739</S> even<S>2532</S> the patriarch<S>3966</S> Abraham<S>11</S> gave<S>1325</S> the tenth<S>1181</S> of<S>1537</S> the spoils<S>205</S>.
And<S>2532</S> verily<S>3303</S> they that are of<S>1537</S> the sons<S>5207</S> of Levi<S>3017</S>, who<S>3588</S> receive<S>2983</S> the office of the priesthood<S>2405</S>, have<S>2192</S> a commandment<S>1785</S> to take tithes<S>586</S> of the people<S>2992</S> according to<S>2596</S> the law<S>3551</S>, that is<S>5123</S>, of their<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>, though<S>2539</S> they come<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the loins<S>3751</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>:
But<S>1161</S> he whose descent is<S>1075</S> not<S>3361</S> counted<S>1075</S> from<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> received tithes<S>1183</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> blessed<S>2127</S> him that had<S>2192</S> the promises<S>1860</S>. <sup>descent: or, pedigree</sup>
And<S>1161</S> without<S>5565</S> all<S>3956</S> contradiction<S>485</S> the less<S>1640</S> is blessed<S>2127</S> of<S>5259</S> the better<S>2909</S>.
And<S>2532</S> here<S>5602</S> <S>3303</S> men<S>444</S> that die<S>599</S> receive<S>2983</S> tithes<S>1181</S>; but<S>1161</S> there<S>1563</S> he receiveth them, of whom it is witnessed<S>3140</S> that<S>3754</S> he liveth<S>2198</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as<S>5613</S> I may so say<S>2031</S> <S>2036</S>, Levi<S>3017</S> also<S>2532</S>, who<S>3588</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> tithes<S>1181</S>, payed tithes<S>1183</S> in<S>1223</S> Abraham<S>11</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he was<S>2258</S> yet<S>2089</S> in<S>1722</S> the loins<S>3751</S> of his father<S>3962</S>, when<S>3753</S> Melchisedec<S>3198</S> met<S>4876</S> him<S>846</S>.
If<S>1487</S> <S>3303</S> therefore<S>3767</S> perfection<S>5050</S> were<S>2258</S> by<S>1223</S> the Levitical<S>3020</S> priesthood<S>2420</S>, (for<S>1063</S> under<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S> the people<S>2992</S> received the law<S>3549</S>,) what<S>5101</S> further<S>2089</S> need<S>5532</S> was there that another<S>2087</S> priest<S>2409</S> should rise<S>450</S> after<S>2596</S> the order<S>5010</S> of Melchisedec<S>3198</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> be called<S>3004</S> after<S>2596</S> the order<S>5010</S> of Aaron<S>2</S>?
For<S>1063</S> the priesthood<S>2420</S> being changed<S>3346</S>, there is made<S>1096</S> of<S>1537</S> necessity<S>318</S> a change<S>3331</S> also<S>2532</S> of the law<S>3551</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he of<S>1909</S> whom<S>3739</S> these things<S>5023</S> are spoken<S>3004</S> pertaineth<S>3348</S> to another<S>2087</S> tribe<S>5443</S>, of<S>575</S> which<S>3739</S> no man<S>3762</S> gave attendance<S>4337</S> at the altar<S>2379</S>.
For<S>1063</S> it is evident<S>4271</S> that<S>3754</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> sprang<S>393</S> out of<S>1537</S> Juda<S>2455</S>; of<S>1519</S> which<S>3739</S> tribe<S>5443</S> Moses<S>3475</S> spake<S>2980</S> nothing<S>3762</S> concerning<S>4012</S> priesthood<S>2420</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it is<S>2076</S> yet<S>2089</S> far more<S>4054</S> evident<S>2612</S>: for<S>1487</S> that after<S>2596</S> the similitude<S>3665</S> of Melchisedec<S>3198</S> there ariseth<S>450</S> another<S>2087</S> priest<S>2409</S>,
Who<S>3739</S> is made<S>1096</S>, not<S>3756</S> after<S>2596</S> the law<S>3551</S> of a carnal<S>4559</S> commandment<S>1785</S>, but<S>235</S> after<S>2596</S> the power<S>1411</S> of an endless<S>179</S> life<S>2222</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he testifieth<S>3140</S>,<S>3754</S> Thou<S>4771</S> art a priest<S>2409</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> after<S>2596</S> the order<S>5010</S> of Melchisedec<S>3198</S>.
For<S>1063</S> there is<S>1096</S> verily<S>3303</S> a disannulling<S>115</S> of the commandment<S>1785</S> going before<S>4254</S> for<S>1223</S> the weakness<S>772</S> and<S>2532</S> unprofitableness<S>512</S> thereof<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the law<S>3551</S> made<S>5048</S> nothing<S>3762</S> perfect<S>5048</S>, but<S>1161</S> the bringing in<S>1898</S> of a better<S>2909</S> hope<S>1680</S> did; by<S>1223</S> the which<S>3739</S> we draw nigh<S>1448</S> unto God<S>2316</S>. <sup>the bringing: or, it was the bringing in</sup>
And<S>2532</S> inasmuch as<S>2596</S> <S>3745</S> not<S>3756</S> without<S>5565</S> an oath<S>3728</S> he was made priest:
(For<S>1063</S> those priests<S>2409</S> were<S>3303</S> <S>1526</S> made<S>1096</S> without<S>5565</S> an oath<S>3728</S>; but<S>1161</S> this with<S>3326</S> an oath<S>3728</S> by<S>1223</S> him that said<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, The Lord<S>2962</S> sware<S>3660</S> and<S>2532</S> will<S>3338</S> not<S>3756</S> repent<S>3338</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> art a priest<S>2409</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> after<S>2596</S> the order<S>5010</S> of Melchisedec<S>3198</S>:) <sup>without: or, without swearing of an oath</sup>
By<S>2596</S> so much<S>5118</S> was<S>1096</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> made<S>1096</S> a surety<S>1450</S> of a better<S>2909</S> testament<S>1242</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they<S>1526</S> truly<S>3303</S> were<S>1526</S> <S>1096</S> many<S>4119</S> priests<S>2409</S>, because they were not suffered<S>2967</S> to continue<S>3887</S> by reason of<S>1223</S> death<S>2288</S>:
But<S>1161</S> this man, because<S>1223</S> he<S>846</S> continueth<S>3306</S> ever<S>1519</S> <S>165</S>, hath<S>2192</S> an unchangeable<S>531</S> priesthood<S>2420</S>. <sup>an: or, which passeth not from one to another</sup>
Wherefore<S>3606</S> he is able<S>1410</S> also<S>2532</S> to save them<S>4982</S> to<S>1519</S> the uttermost<S>3838</S> that come<S>4334</S> unto God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S>, seeing he ever<S>3842</S> liveth<S>2198</S> to<S>1519</S> make intercession<S>1793</S> for<S>5228</S> them<S>846</S>. <sup>to the: or, evermore</sup>
For<S>1063</S> such<S>5108</S> an high priest<S>749</S> became<S>4241</S> us<S>2254</S>, who is holy<S>3741</S>, harmless<S>172</S>, undefiled<S>283</S>, separate<S>5563</S> from<S>575</S> sinners<S>268</S>, and<S>2532</S> made<S>1096</S> higher than<S>5308</S> the heavens<S>3772</S>;
Who<S>3739</S> needeth<S>2192</S> <S>318</S> not<S>3756</S> daily<S>2596</S> <S>2250</S>, as<S>5618</S> those high priests<S>749</S>, to offer up<S>399</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S>, first<S>4386</S> for<S>5228</S> his own<S>2398</S> sins<S>266</S>, and then<S>1899</S> for the people's<S>2992</S>: for<S>1063</S> this<S>5124</S> he did<S>4160</S> once<S>2178</S>, when he offered up<S>399</S> himself<S>1438</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the law<S>3551</S> maketh<S>2525</S> men<S>444</S> high priests<S>749</S> which have<S>2192</S> infirmity<S>769</S>; but<S>1161</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the oath<S>3728</S>, which<S>3588</S> was since<S>3326</S> the law<S>3551</S>, maketh the Son<S>5207</S>, who is consecrated<S>5048</S> for<S>1519</S> evermore<S>165</S>. <sup>consecrated: Gr. perfected</sup>
